modules_completed: order_book.py - High-performance order book with 1M+ ticks/second support
price_generator.py - Realistic price generation with multiple models (Brownian, Jump Diffusion, GARCH)
market_simulator.py - Complete market simulation with multiple participant types
event_simulator.py - News and market event simulation system
scenarios_implemented: bull_market.py - Bull market conditions with positive drift and low volatility
bear_market.py - Bear market with negative drift and high correlation
high_volatility.py - Extreme volatility with frequent regime changes
flash_crash.py - Flash crash scenario with liquidity crisis
tests_created: test_order_book.py - 14 tests covering order matching, priority, and performance
test_price_generator.py - 12 tests for price models and market dynamics
test_market_simulator.py - 14 tests for complete simulation functionality
next_steps: Implement market models for different asset classes (stocks, bonds, crypto)
